about_the_game:
Embark on a perilous journey through the cosmic abyss in your spaceship. As you delve into the Void, waves of relentless enemies swarm around you. Grow stronger with each battle and carefully choose upgrades to build your arsenal. Confront powerful Zentharians commanders and meticulously navigate their intricate “Bullet-Hell” like attack patterns. This top-down shooter roguelike will test your wits and reflexes. Inpirations from Brotato, "The Void Rains Upon Her Heart" and "Death Must Die".

Features:

  • Aim at mouse point or Twin-stick type shooting
  • Face more than 10 waves of enemies, each more deadlier than the last
  • Confront powerful Zentharian Commanders in Bullet-Hell/Shoot'em up Boss encounters
  • Short runs of 30 minutes or less
  • Gain experience and carefully select ship upgrades to get stronger
  • Balance offensive and defensive capabilities to overcome your foes
  • Chase hiscores - Accumulate points and strive to beat your personal best
  • Keep track of interesting statistics as your run progresses
  • Customize your ship before you delve into the void
  • Immerse yourself in an extensive music list as you battle against the odds
  • Continue where you last left off (upcoming feature)
  • Keep a short history of your previous runs (upcoming feature)

name: Into the V.O.I.D.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+

short_description: Board your spaceship and delve Into the VOID, facing waves of relentless enemies. Grow stronger with each battle to overcome Zentharian commanders and their “Bullet-Hell” attack patterns. This top-down roguelike shooter promises short but intense runs where your wits and reflexes will be tested.
